data.title: Ivy Tech Community College
data.text:
Customized SKILLS Training

At Ivy Tech Community College, we know every business is different. That’s why we provide corporate education and short-term skills training customized for your needs—offered how, when, and where you need it. We can develop classes in a variety of disciplines and sectors—management and supervisory skills, safety, healthcare, information technology, and many more—and focus on topics or certifications that will help your employees gain skills and your company succeed. With our deep resources across the state, the sky really is the limit on the types of training we can put together for you.

FOR ALL TYPES OF ORGANIZATIONS

Our dedicated staff of Employer Consultants on the Ivy+ Career Link team at every Ivy Tech campus work to develop partnerships with local and regional organizations that have unique training needs. We work with businesses, industry, state government agencies, nonprofit organizations, and chambers of commerce to develop customized skills training.

HOW IT WORKS

Our process begins with a no-obligation consultation. We’ll take the time to listen and learn about your challenges and goals and conduct a thorough needs analysis for your organization. We'll also share information about our services and capabilities so you can see what fits best for you.

Then we'll work to deliver a customized skills training solution tied to your organization's objectives to enhance the skills of your workforce exactly how you need to increase productivity and drive revenue growth.

Training can be delivered either onsite or off-site using face-to-face, online, or any combination of instructional methods that meet your specific needs.

READY TO TAKE THE NEXT STEP?

Contact your local Ivy Tech Employer Consultant on the Ivy+ Career Link team today to learn more about custom training options.
